Articles.Content:
Hello, I saw in a youtube video someone transferring fuel between tanks. Is this in the base game or was this a mod? If it's already in the game, how do I do this?

Thanks!
It's in the game yeah, right click a tank, then Alt+rightclick another tank, you'll see the in/out buttons (if the fuels match of course)
Click one tank, then alt-click the second tank.
If you want more options, here is another way: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25823-PLUGIN-0-19-1-TAC-Fuel-Balancer
